frase.N1:
As each separate dying ember
wrought its ghost upon the floor,

frase.N2:
you can sense the eagerness
in which he aches for the morrow.

frase.N3:
How vainly he longs to borrow,
from his books surcease of sorrow,

frase.N4:
sorrow for a lost and radiant maiden
whom the angels named—

frase.N7:
Given your tapping,
you can hear the man muttering again from the inside.

frase.N1:
’Tis some visitor
entreating entrance at my chamber door

frase.N2:
Some late visitor
entreating entrance at my chamber door

frase.N1: This it is and nothing more.

escolha.Esc1: TAP AT HIS WINDOW LATTICE AGAIN.
